name: Plant Slash
description:
A game where you have to fight a plant while avoid bees and worms and even spiders that can jump at you, how scary!

lore:

you are larry, an ant that has been bullied, now he wants revenge, he heard that there is a plant that make you powerfull, and he will reach and beat that plant!

ControlsfunctionW/A/S/Dreplace the d-pad from the gameboy, allows you to move in the game and the menus, also directioning your bulletsKreplaces the "A" button from the gameboy, allows you to select, and jump, sometimes you cant select not for bug, but for avoiding pressing something for errorLreplaces the "B" button from the gameboy, allows you to shoot and exit the menusEnterreplaces the "start" button from the gameboy , allows you to select in menus and pause the game during gameplayEscapethis allows you to "turn off" the gameboyF5this is an extra to switch from fullscreen to windowed and backwards
